alert.note: Alert for Butte; Custer; Lawrence; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 6:09PM MDT until May 27 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL BUTTE...NORTHWESTERN CUSTER...LAWRENCE AND SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 609 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crow Peak to 3 miles southwest of Brownsville to 2 miles east of Medicine Mountain, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lead, Deadwood, Central City, Brownsville, Roubaix Lake, Spearfish, Galena, Saint Onge and Apple Springs. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
